description: Modifies the attributes of the specified VPC endpoint service configuration. If you set or modify the private DNS name, you must prove that you own the private DNS domain name.

parameters.name: AddNetworkLoadBalancerArns
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of Network Load Balancers to add to the service configuration. (string) ---

parameters.name: RemoveNetworkLoadBalancerArns
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of Network Load Balancers to remove from the service configuration. (string) ---

parameters.name: AddGatewayLoadBalancerArns
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of Gateway Load Balancers to add to the service configuration. (string) ---

parameters.name: RemoveGatewayLoadBalancerArns
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of Gateway Load Balancers to remove from the service configuration. (string) ---

parameters.name: AddSupportedIpAddressTypes
parameters.description: The IP address types to add to the service configuration. (string) ---

parameters.name: RemoveSupportedIpAddressTypes
parameters.description: The IP address types to remove from the service configuration. (string) ---

parameters.name: AddSupportedRegions
parameters.description: The supported Regions to add to the service configuration. (string) ---

parameters.name: RemoveSupportedRegions
parameters.description: The supported Regions to remove from the service configuration. (string) ---

nested_items.name: Return
nested_items.description: Returns true if the request succeeds; otherwise, it returns an error.
